description: This file defines the AutomationRuleService class, implementing IAutomationRuleService interface for managing automation rules including create, list, update, delete, and toggle operations, using Entity Framework Core for database interactions.

classes.name: AutomationRuleService
classes.description: Service class for managing automation rules, providing methods to create, list, update, delete, and toggle rules.

methods.name: CreateAsync
methods.description: Creates a new automation rule for a specified user and saves it asynchronously to the database.

methods.name: ListAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a list of automation rules for a specified user, ordered by creation date descending.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Updates an existing automation rule based on rule ID and user ID, returning the updated DTO or null if not found.

methods.name: DeleteAsync
methods.description: Deletes an automation rule by ID for a user and returns a boolean indicating success.

methods.name: ToggleAsync
methods.description: Enables or disables an automation rule by ID for a user, returning a success status.

methods.name: Map
methods.description: Private static method that maps an AutomationRule entity to an AutomationRuleDto.
